---
title: "Analysis"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

## Data Processing

```{r process-data}
process_data <- function(df) {
    df %>%
        mutate(log_value = log(value)) %>%
        filter(!is.na(log_value))
}
```

## Visualization

```{r plot-function}
create_plot <- function(data, x_var, y_var) {
    ggplot(data, aes_string(x = x_var, y = y_var)) +
        geom_point() +
        theme_minimal()
}
```
